If you were in interplanetary space and decide to use Kerbin for a gravity assist to get to Duna, would it be worth it? I set it up in the picture below:

Thanks.

Yes, it takes less Delta-V to get into a 1:1 resonance with Kerbin than to get to Duna, but your trajectory will only have a prograde/retrograde component, no radial. A 1:2 resonance and a DSM (Deep Space Manouevre) waste more fuel.
It was nice of you to offer help, Interplanet Janet, but I believe Bagel came to his/her own conclusions on the matter around 2 years ago.
Yeah...I saw the date.  But if they didn't, I gave them the answer.
